title: Millhouse: a white comedy
creator_credit: White Film Company and Emile de Antonio
brief_description: Newsreel and television footage is used to satirise the political career of Richard Millhouse Nixon. The film landed de Antonio on the director on Nixon’s infamous enemy list.
creator_credit_for_label: White Film Company and Emile de Antonio
